short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Using acronyms also assumes that everyone is on the same page, acronyms add a layer of unnecessary complexity add stress.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Using acronyms also assumes that everyone is on the same page. We have pretty difficult discussions to make every day, and acronyms add a layer of unnecessary complexity that can add stress to an already difficult discussion.
